## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install dlgutil in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure dlgutil package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to dlgutil
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/civvic/dlgutil):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/civvic/dlgutil.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/civvic/dlgutil)

``` sh
$ conda install -c civvic dlgutil
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/dlgutil/)

``` sh
$ pip install dlgutil
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/civvic/dlgutil)’s
[pages](https://civvic.github.io/dlgutil/). Additionally you can find
package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/civvic/dlgutil) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/dlgutil/) respectively.
